casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anthony Leon HOOVER. No. 370P04-7. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. Elizabeth N. Strickland, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of May 2007 by Defendant for Writ Production of Documentary of State Procedure: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2007." HUDSON, J., recused.
